parameters.(SEL)hook:: The selector you want to hook.
parameters.(NSString *)inClass:: The name of the class you are hooking.
parameters.(NSString *)fromClass:: The name of the class that your new method is in.

parameters.(SEL)addMethod:: The selector you want to hook.
parameters.(Class)fromClass:: The class that the new method is in.
parameters.(Class)intoClass:: The class you are adding the method into.

parameters.(NSString *)classForString:: The name of the class that you want to get.

message: classForString runs objc_getClass to access the class in Objective-C runtime.
